fields.name: contactinfo
fields.fieldText: Please create a contact that will be associated with the opportunity.

fields.name: contactroleinfo
fields.fieldText: Please select the contact's role.

fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred creating the contact. Please correct the issue(s) and try again.


Error message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Error_Message_0
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred creating the primary contact role. Please correct the issue(s) and try again.


Error message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Invalid_RecordId_Text
fields.fieldText: The record provided is not a valid Account, Contact, or Opportunity.

fields.name: Primary_Contact_Required_Text
fields.fieldText: In order to associate contacts to opportunity as Opportunity Contact Roles, select opportunity contacts and primary contact.

fields.name: Primary_Opportunity_Contact_Role
fields.helpText: Contact selected as Primary contact should also be selected as opportunity contact.

fields.name: createcontact
fields.fieldText: In order to create a new contact, select the Create New Contact checkbox.

fields.name: Opportunity_Type
fields.helpText: In order to create Acquia or Workfront opportunities, select opportunity type as 'Acquia' or 'Workfront' and then select business type(upsell/New Business) in the next screen.

fields.name: Primary_ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Primary Contact is not selected as opportunity contact. Please select the primary contact as Opportunity contact and try again.
